GSD.description:
fbdev: smscufx: Fix several use-after-free bugs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.77 by commit cc6a7249842fceda7574ceb63275a2d5e99d2862. For more details please see the references link.
